item.title: Magic Eden Pulls Plug on Bitcoin and Ethereum Support, Doubles Down on Solana
item.description: Magic Eden is pulling support for Ethereum-compatible and Bitcoin-based assets, marking an end to its multi-chain approach to user adoption.

item.description: Trump Media is considering spinning off its Truth Social platform into its own public entity.

item.description: Japan‚Äôs regulators and conglomerates are working to bring one of the world‚Äôs key funding currencies into DeFi, but retail activity remains muted.

item.title: Ethereum Tokens Swiped, Returned After South Korean Tax Service Publishes Wallet Seed Phrases
item.description: South Korea's tax service shared the seed phrases for seized wallets in a press release. The contents were then taken, but ultimately returned.

item.title: Ban on Crypto Privacy Tools Would Be Counterproductive: UK Think Tank

item.title: Minnesota to weigh ban on crypto kiosks after scam reports

item.description: Between credit stress concerns, a hot PPI inflation reading, and tensions between U.S. and Iran, investors have plenty of reasons to stay away from risk assets.

item.title: Minnesota Weighs Total Ban on Bitcoin and Crypto ATMs
item.description: Minnesota lawmakers are considering a ban on Bitcoin and crypto ATMs, with legislation introduced in response to a growing number of scams.

item.description: The new post reflects Buterin‚Äôs renewed focus on scaling Ethereum‚Äôs base layer, after several years in which much of the ecosystem‚Äôs scaling strategy centered on layer-2 rollups.

item.title: How the EU‚Äôs crypto tax rules are expected to work for users and platforms
